events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop has a cracked screen and some noticeable scratches on the casing. This is very disappointing as I expected a new, flawless product.
The issue was identified as a product defect based on the customer's description of a cracked screen and scratches.
The case has been assigned to the technical support team to handle the defective product complaint.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear about the cracked screen on your laptop. I'll do my best to assist you with this issue.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged screen and scratches, along with the order number? This will help us expedite the resolution.
I have attached clear photos of the cracked screen and the scratches you requested, and here is my order number as well. Please let me know what can be done.
Thank you for the photos. We will send a replacement laptop immediately and arrange a return for the faulty one. You will receive a shipping label shortly.
I appreciate the quick response and the offer to send a replacement. Looking forward to receiving the new laptop soon.
Your replacement laptop has been shipped today. Please use the attached label to return the defective device at your convenience.
We wanted to check in and ensure that your replacement laptop arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. We would appreciate your feedback on the support you received.
